```{r}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo=TRUE, message=TRUE, warning=TRUE)
library(ggplot2)
```


```{r echo=F}
actionButton("add", "Add")
```

```{r echo=F}
values = reactiveValues(counter_value = 0, sampled_value = runif(min=0, max=1)) 
observeEvent(input$add, { 
    values$counter_value = values$counter_value + 1
    values$sampled_value = runif(min=0, max=1)    
})
```

```{r echo=F}
renderText({ 
    paste("Counter: ", values$counter_value)
    paste("Value: ", values$sampled_value)
})

renderPlot({

    # df = data.frame(N=values$counter_value)
    
})
```
